name: OSHIYA! PUSH!
description:
Take on the role of Isamu Takao, Oshiya Extraordinaire, in fast-paced arcade game OSHIYA! PUSH!

Push the growing crowds of Tokyo rush-hour commuters into packed train cars before the train leaves the station. Using a two button control scheme, keep the rhythm and save the day! Ganbatte!

The game was made for the Ludum Dare 34 Jam over a period of 3 days by a team of 5.
